original_definition: 'gaseous fuel local space heater' means an open fronted local space heater or a closed fronted local space heater using gaseous fuel;
generated_definition: 'gaseous fuel local space heater' means a heating appliance that uses gaseous fuel, such as natural gas or propane, to heat a limited space or area within a building.

Article 2: ‘gaseous fuel local space heater’ means an open fronted local space heater or a closed fronted local space heater using gaseous fuel;
